Pros: kids seem to enjoy the variety of games and it keeps them entertained and learn some new topics. Cons: significant oversight with the grownups tab having no PW lock in place, even while in Samsung kids. This allows kids to delete games from storage and to be able to change the amount of gb allowed to be downloaded shift from less than 1 GB to up to 5 GB. Biggest issue is kids can switch from cellular data to wifi easily, resulting in kids using up cellular data without realizing it.
